title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 465.6 - Investigations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 465.6 - Investigations

State Regulations
(a) Investigation. After the filing of a complaint, the regional director of the division office
in which it was filed, or to which it has been transferred, shall make, with
the assistance of staff, a prompt and fair investigation of the allegations of
the complaint. (b) Methods. Such
investigation may be made by field visit, written or oral inquiry, conference, or any other method or combination thereof deemed suitable in the discretion of
the regional director or the director of regional affairs. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
465.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
